title: Husband for Real
description: Wedded for convenience…or married for real?Rose was shocked when James turned up…long after their wedding of convenience. She'd loved James when they'd hastily married, and she'd fought hard to put their subsequent—and just as hasty—separation behind her.After all these years, Rose never expected James to arrive in person to tell her that he wasn't prepared to end their marriage. Was she? The hurt of the past hadn't quenched her love, or their mutual physical attraction…
author: Catherine George
